name: SECRET SUB
description:
I recently found itch.io, and for me this is great. I love writing DOS games. Been doing it for years. So I would like to share what we old timers played back in the days BEFORE there was windows or mice :-)

This is my first release of a game (one that I actually finished). It is NOT polished at all, and looking for some ideas to make it more exciting. Will also be working on an achievement section. I have zero plans for multi-player. I may write a similar game that can accommodate such an en-devour, however, this is too small of a game to do that.

Very special thanks to those that make a donation. Every Red Bull helps keep me awake to work on it.

I know this game does not appeal to all, as there is not really any eye-candy to speak of, but it is a niche that I enjoy!

Cheers all!
